title: Hearty mushroom soup
ingredients: ['20g butter', '1 large onion, chopped', '1 clove garlic, chopped', '350g mushrooms, sliced', '2 tablespoons paprika', '4 tablespoons freshly chopped dill', 'salt and freshly ground pepper', '40 g butter', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '250ml milk', '500ml vegetable stock', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '120ml fresh cream', 'dollop soured cream for garnish (optional)', 'freshly chopped dill for garnish']
